structure.README.md:
# zaika-ai-agent

## Overview
AI Agent developed by Yasser Akhtar for business automation and customer engagement.

## Features
- ‚úÖ Intelligent customer interaction
- ‚úÖ Business data analysis
- ‚úÖ Automated responses
- ‚úÖ Performance analytics
- ‚úÖ Easy integration

## Installation
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
python src/agent.py
```

## Usage
```python
from src.agent import Agent

agent = Agent()
response = agent.process_query("Your question here")
print(response)
```

## Configuration
See `docs/setup.md` for detailed configuration options.

- üìä Data processing capabilities

## Installation

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
python server.py
```

## Configuration

```json
}
```
